verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Happy Birthday to you
Happy Birthday to you

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Happy Birthday,
Happy Birthday
Happy Birthday to you

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Sweeter as the years go by
Sweeter as the years go by

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Richer, fuller, deeper
Jesus loves me sweeter
Sweeter as the years go by

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Happy Birthday to you
One birth will not do

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Born again means salvation
And to heaven we'll go
